alert.note: Alert for Reynolds (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 15 at 3:51PM CDT until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Missouri, including the following county, Reynolds. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. Additional thunderstorms with heavy rain could move into the advisory area over the next several hours. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Reynolds, Ellington, Centerville, Redford and Corridon.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
